title: Alarm disables Do not Disturb
content:
Last night I set up a wake up alarm for 7:30 am. I have a rule for Do not Disturb that turns on at 10 pm through 9 am, behavior set to "Muted, but allow alarms". About an hour after I went to sleep I woke up to hearing my email alert. I looked at the phone, DND was OFF. I manually set it to On and went back to sleep. At about 4 am my email goes off AGAIN. Sure enough, DND was off AGAIN!!!

Is this a known bug? If you set up an alarm after DND turns on automatically it then turns it off?

Thanks
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
